titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Grand Rapids made [videorecording] / Central Michigan University Public Broadcasting ; in association with the Public Museum of Grand Rapids ; a film by William Jamerson.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Grand Rapids made [videorecording] / Central Michigan University Public Broadcasting ; in association with the Public Museum of Grand Rapids ; a film by William Jamerson.

physdesc.physfacet: sd., col. with b&w sequences; 80 min.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [Michigan?] : Forgotten Films & Video ; Hillsdale, MI : Distributed by Hillsdale Publishers, c1998.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Subtitle on videocassette label: Golden age of Furniture City, USA

odd.head: Creation/Production Credits
odd.p: Written, produced and directed by William Jamerson ; cinematography, Jim Jordan, Ric Wilson ; edited by Demian Krentz ; music director, Elizabeth Bannister.

archdesc.scopecontent: Explores the furniture industry and its evolution in Grand Rapids, Michigan, from the 1850s through the 1960s.
